personal.name: Ibrahim Khan Riyadh
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.tagline: Frontend Developer | React, Next.js, Vue.js & Nuxt.js Enthusiast
personal.bio: I am a frontend web developer specializing in building modern, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces using React, Next.js, Vue.js, and Nuxt.js. I focus on clean UI design, performance, and great user experience using Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, and modern frontend tools.
personal.closingBio: Always eager to collaborate on exciting frontend projects, explore new UI technologies, and craft beautiful digital experiences. Let‚Äôs connect and build impactful interfaces together!
story: I am a frontend web developer with strong experience in building modern single-page and server-rendered applications using React, Next.js, Vue.js, and Nuxt.js.
I enjoy translating UI/UX designs into responsive, accessible, and high-performance interfaces using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI.
My projects include a Historical Artifacts UI Platform, a Blood Donation Frontend System, and a Plant Care Tracker UI ‚Äî all focused on clean design, smooth interactions, and usability.
I am passionate about frontend problem-solving, component-based architecture, and writing clean, maintainable UI code while continuously learning modern frontend trends.

experience.title: Team Lead & Deputy Project Coordinator
experience.description: Lead a team of developers and designers to successfully deliver multiple projects on time. Coordinated cross-functional teams to ensure smooth project execution and communication. Managed project timelines, resources, and client expectations effectively.
achievements: Lead multiple projects from planning to delivery ensuring timely completion
Coordinated cross-functional teams for smooth communication and workflow
Implemented best practices that improved team productivity and project quality
Gained strong skills in project management, team leadership, and problem-solving
Mentored team members and enhanced overall efficiency using collaborative tools

education.degree: Bachelor of Science (BSc), Computer Science and Engineering
